class AssignmentViewByID(**kwargs)#

Bases: APIView

delete(request: HttpRequest, id: str)#

Delete assignment with the given id.

Parameters:

  • request (HttpRequest) – The request object

  • id (str) – The id of the object to be deleted

get(request: HttpRequest, id: str)#

Retrives an assignment by id.

Parameters:

  • request (HttpRequest) – The request object that was sent to the view

  • id (str) – The id of the object to be retrieved

put(request: HttpRequest, id: str)#

Replace the assignment with id with the request.

Parameters:

  • request (HttpRequest) – The request object that was sent to the view

  • id (str) – the id of the object you want to update
